word: H4692 - מָצֹור - mâtsôwr - maw-tsore' - Besieged - முற்றுகையிடப்பட்ட

sections.paragraph: siege - enclosure, siege, entrenchment, siege works, a rampart
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From H6696; something hemming in, that is, (objectively) a mound (of besiegers), (abstractly) a siege, (figuratively) distress; or (subjectively) a fastness: - besieged, bulwark, defence, fenced, fortress, siege, strong (hold), tower.
Cognate: H4692, H4694, H6696, H6887
